title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Title: Essential Teal Yoga Mat with Carrying Strap - Extra Thick for Comfort, 72"x24"

Description: Elevate your workout experience with the Essential Teal Yoga Mat, perfect for yoga, Pilates, and a variety of floor exercises. This extra-thick mat, measuring a plush 2/5 inch in density, provides the ultimate surface for those seeking additional comfort and support during their fitness routines.

Constructed from soft, NBR foam, the mat ensures a cushioned feel, making it an excellent choice for beginners or anyone prioritizing comfort during their practice. The mat's generous dimensions, 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, offer ample space for a full range of movement.

Transporting your yoga mat is a breeze, thanks to the included easy-cinch carrier strap. Simply roll up your mat, secure it with the strap, and you're ready to carry it to your next session with ease.

Whether you're perfecting your poses at home or taking your practice on the go, this Essential Teal Yoga Mat is your reliable partner for a comfortable and effective fitness journey.

Title: Teal Gaiam Essentials Thick Fitness Mat with Carrying Strap, 72"x24"x10mm

Elevate your fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat, designed for a variety of exercises including yoga, Pilates, and other floor workouts. The teal mat measures 72"L x 24"W, offering a generous 2/5 inch thickness for superior cushioning and support.

This durable, extra-thick mat is crafted from NBR foam to ensure a comfortable experience, whether you're a beginner seeking a padded surface or a seasoned pro needing extra support for your joints. The soft texture provides a reliable foundation for your stretches and poses, enhancing your practice.

Convenience is key, and that's why this mat includes an easy-cinch carrier strap, allowing for effortless transport and storage. Take your workout anywhere with this lightweight (3.11 pounds) and portable solution.

Opt for comfort and support with this all-purpose fitness mat, perfect for home or studio use.

Title: Premium Gaiam Essentials Yoga Mat - Teal, Extra Thick with Carrying Strap, 72"x24"

Description: Elevate your yoga and fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Exercise Mat. Perfect for various workouts such as yoga, Pilates, and other floor exercises, this mat provides the extra cushioning and support you need for optimum performance.

Crafted from plush NBR foam, our 2/5-inch thick mat ensures a comfortable and padded surface, ideal for beginners or anyone seeking additional comfort during their workout. The generous dimensions of 72"L x 24"W offer ample space for a full range of motion in any pose.

Convenience is key; that's why our durable yoga mat includes an easy-cinch carrier strap. This allows you to roll up your mat swiftly and carry it with ease to your next class or workout space. Weighing just over 3 pounds, it's lightweight and portable, ensuring your exercise routine is never interrupted.

The serene teal color not only adds a touch of calm to your practice but also complements your workout gear. Make your wellness journey comfortable and stylish with the Gaiam Essentials Yoga Mat.

Title: Essential Teal Yoga Mat by Gaiam – Extra Thick with Carrying Strap, 72"x24"x2/5"

Elevate your fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat, perfectly crafted for a wide range of exercises including yoga, Pilates, and other floor workouts. Its generous 72"x24" size and 2/5 inch thickness offer ample space and the ideal blend of support and cushioning for optimal performance.

Constructed from plush NBR foam, this mat ensures every stretch and pose is comfortably cushioned, making it excellent for beginners or anyone seeking a gentle yet durable exercise surface.

Simplify your gym or studio visits with the included easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap, providing convenience and ease as you transport your mat to and from your workout sessions.

With its striking teal hue and practical design, this versatile fitness mat not only supports your body but also adds a touch of style to your exercise regime. The dimensions of 72 inches in length, 24 inches in width, and 2/5 inch thickness, weighing 3.11 pounds, make it an indispensable accessory for home or studio use.

Title: Gaiam Essentials Premium Yoga Mat with Carrier Strap - Teal, 72"x24"x2/5" Thick

Elevate your yoga practice with the Gaiam Essentials Premium Yoga Mat, featuring a generous 72" length and 24" width for ample space during your routines. At 2/5 inch thickness, this mat offers superior cushioning to enhance your comfort during yoga, Pilates, or any fitness activity that calls for additional support.

Constructed from high-density NBR foam, the mat's plush surface ensures a soft and supportive experience, making it an excellent choice for beginners or anyone seeking extra padding. The striking teal color adds a touch of tranquility to your exercise space.

For convenience on the go, this package includes a practical easy-cinch carrier strap, enabling you to roll up your mat and carry it effortlessly to the studio, park, or wherever your wellness journey takes you.

Dimensions: 72"L x 24"W x 2/5" Thick, with a lightweight design at 3.11 pounds, this mat combines functionality with ease of transport. Start your fitness regime with comfort and style!

Title: Teal Gaiam Essentials Extra Thick Yoga & Exercise Mat with Carrier Strap, 72"x24"x2/5"

Elevate your fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat, the perfect companion for yoga, Pilates, and other floor exercises. Sporting a vibrant teal color, this mat is not only a stylish choice but also a practical one, thanks to its generous dimensions of 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, coupled with a comfortable 2/5 inch thickness.

Enjoy the plush comfort of the NBR foam construction that provides ample cushioning, ensuring a soft and supportive surface for all your poses and stretches. Ideal for beginners or anyone seeking extra padding, this mat brings both comfort and durability to your workout space.

The convenience is unparalleled, with an included easy-cinch carrier strap that makes transportation a breeze. Simply roll up your mat, secure it with the strap, and you’re ready to carry your fitness wherever you go.

Get ready to transform your exercise experience with this all-purpose fitness mat that's not just designed for the studio but versatile enough for home use, whether you're doing knee exercises or need a standing pad. With a weight of just 3.11 pounds, it's lightweight enough to take on the go but substantial enough to provide the stability you need.

Choose the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat for a blend of comfort, convenience, and style in your exercise routine.

Title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal

Description: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; teal

FITNESS & EXERCISE MAT: Classic yoga mat is great for all types of fitness and exercise routines including yoga, Pilates and any floor exercise where additional cushion and support is appreciated.

EXTRA THICK YOGA MAT: These 2/5 inch exercise mats make for the ideal all purpose fitness mat in the studio or at home, even around the house under knees or as a standing pad or cushion.

SOFT CUSHION: This yoga mat made of NBR foam is designed to provide soft cushioning with the padded material for comfortable stretching and posing - an ideal yoga mat for beginners with comfort in mind.

INCLUDES YOGA MAT CARRIER STRAP: Included with your yoga mat is a carrying strap so you can strap up your mat and go.
